diff_hunk:
@@ -1926,6 +1926,8 @@ tf_cuda_library(
 tf_py_wrap_cc(
     name = "pywrap_tensorflow",
     srcs = ["tensorflow.i"],
+    # set linkstatic = 0 so that only apply whole archive to libraries that need to be force linked.
body:
Actually, this change is only needed to resolve a link error when using /WHOLEARCHIVE option, it fails if cudart.lib is also forced linked. But it turned out even I fixed the link error by not force linking cudart.lib, the program will still fail at runtime. That's why I gave up using /WHOLEARCHIVE. If we don't use /WHOLEARCHIVE, the build will succeed with or without this change.

Hmm.. looks like it might be causing some test failure, let's revert this change first.
